attributes.action: do more for people who do not consider themselfs disabled but do have a disability that puts them at a disadvantage in getting work or benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown i ask you to do more for people like me who really want to work and have taken up and done the offer of training but still find it hard to find work because of a disability that puts them at an unfair disadvantage i would also like to see more employers using the disability symbol on job adverts as i notice a lot of government dept are not using them.
